## 
How It
Works
![How it works](https://bottomless.imgix.net/landing-generic/how-it-works-desktop.png?auto=compress,format&w=850)
## 
Simple
But Powerful
The Smart Scale connects to your WiFi and can be stored anywhere - on your counter, on your shelf, in your cupboard. Multiple sizes available.
![Scale and its attributes](https://bottomless.imgix.net/landing-generic/simple-but-powerful-desktop.jpg?auto=compress,format&w=1100)
## 
Powered By
Bottomless
Your favorite products, always in stock, directly from your favorite brands.
“As a long-time fan of Onyx, it's amazing to get freshly roasted coffee exactly when I need without thinking about it.”
[Get Onyx Coffee Lab](https://bottomless.com/<https:/onyxcoffeelab.com/collections/subscription-by-usage>)
“Using PROMIX pre-workout with Bottomless' smart scale is a game-changer. Convenience, consistency, and great workouts in one powerful combo.”
[Get Promix](https://bottomless.com/<https:/promixnutrition.com>)
“Before Bottomless, I never thought a snack subscription would work for me. It works silently in the background.”
[Get Bearded Brothers](https://bottomless.com/<https:/www.beardedbros.com>)

To sign up for Powered by Bottomless, shop any of our partners and select the “subscribe by usage” option in their purchase options.

## 
Features
You have control over your orders
We send you a message 8-12 hours before your re-order is processed. You can delay or cancel at any time.
We track every order so you don't have to
Don't worry about missing products. We track every order, every day, and proactively replace when needed.
Build a personalized queue or rotation
Build a rotation based on your preferences. Add products to your queue and edit at any time.
## 
Partner
With Us
Are you a Shopify vendor that offers DTC subscriptions? Find out how you can offer Subscribe By Usage to your customers.
[Shopify Partnerships ![->](https://bottomless.imgix.net/landing-generic/arrow-right.svg)Our partnerships have helped partners 3x revenue retention and 1.5x subscription signups. The usage-based subscription gets the timing right on re-orders, eliminating a large cause of churn.](https://bottomless.com/</partners>)
## 
Customer
Reviews
## 
Frequently Asked
Questions
How does it work?
![+](https://bottomless.imgix.net/landing-generic/open-blue.svg)
Sync it with your WiFi network once, then leave your coffee bag on it. The scale then learns from your consumption and re-orders for you at just the right time.
Do I have control of ordering?
![+](https://bottomless.imgix.net/landing-generic/open-blue.svg)
Yes! You will get an alert 8-12 hours before orders are placed so you have a chance to change your product, postpone or cancel.
This alert can be via SMS, email or iOS app.
You can also customize how "eager" our algorithms are to order for you. We can be paranoid and try to optimize for "never running out", we can "balance priorities" or we can try to order later to optimize freshness.
What products does it work with?
![+](https://bottomless.imgix.net/landing-generic/open-blue.svg)
For our coffee service you can find all available products in the Shop. We also offer a curated selection of coffee rotations based on your preferences.
For Pet Food Beta we can support any product available online. Just email support@bottomless.com
What is powered by Bottomless?
![+](https://bottomless.imgix.net/landing-generic/open-blue.svg)
Bottomless powers the subscriptions of roasters and brands so you can get automatic re-stocking of their products at the perfect time.
How do I signup?
![+](https://bottomless.imgix.net/landing-generic/open-blue.svg)
To sign up, select your brand of choice and select your desired product. Select the ‘Subscribe by usage’ option on the product page, and complete the process.
How much does it cost?
![+](https://bottomless.imgix.net/landing-generic/open-blue.svg)
There is no additional charge for the powered by bottomless service. Pay only for your selected product and shipping.
What is the difference between powered by bottomless and signing up for Bottomless directly?
![+](https://bottomless.imgix.net/landing-generic/open-blue.svg)
Powered By Bottomless gives you direct access to one brand at no additional cost. Signing up for Bottomless directly offers access to a marketplace and rotation of different brands for a monthly membership fee.
[Coffee Rotations & Marketplace ![->](https://bottomless.imgix.net/landing-generic/arrow-right.svg)For coffee variety, visit our marketplace where we offer coffee beans from more than 50 roasters across the U.S. Build a queue or select a pre-built rotation. It's all up to you!](https://bottomless.com/</coffee>)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Bottomless**

**What is Bottomless?**
Bottomless is a pioneering startup based in Seattle, WA, founded with the mission to create the first sensor-enabled marketplace for repeat purchases. Their unique approach leverages IoT technology to ensure that customers never have to worry about running out of their favorite products.

**How Does It Work?**
Bottomless employs a smart scale that connects to your Wi-Fi, allowing it to monitor your usage of various products—ranging from coffee to pet food. This scale not only tracks consumption but anticipates when you'll need more supplies, triggering automatic reorders just in time. You get a notification 8-12 hours prior to delivery, so you have full control to adjust or cancel orders if necessary. 

**Products Available** 
Bottomless isn’t limited to coffee; it offers a range of consumables like cat food, protein, snacks, and more, catering to the growing demand for subscription services that adapt to individual consumption habits. They even have a marketplace that features products from over 50 roasters, allowing users to craft personalized queues or rotation orders.

**Background**
Founded as part of Y Combinator’s W19 batch, Bottomless is small but mighty with a dedicated team of just two employees. With an innovative approach to e-commerce, they are tagged under categories like ‘marketplace’, ‘IoT’, and of course, ‘Seattle’.

**The Bottom Line**
If simplicity and smart technology speak to you, Bottomless may be your go-to for smart shopping. The concept of eliminating the guesswork in recurring purchases is not just convenient; it's a game-changer in how we stock our homes. For those constantly worried about running low on essentials, this solution could mean one less thing to think about. 

To learn more about their offerings, check out their website: [Bottomless](https://bottomless.com).
